name: Queen Bee Lip Balms
description:
Plain Jane: 
Honey Inspired Basic lip balm.  Shea & Cocoa Butters.

Chocolate Mint: 
Minty, Cocoa smooches! Lip Plumping & Cooling.

Tangerine Dream:  
Creamy tangerine lip balm. Sweet and Citrus.

NEW! Cherry Bomb: 
Reminiscent of childhood memories, Cherry flavored and all natural.

name: Luxurious Body Oil 4oz.
description:
This oil is extremely nutritious with vitamins A, C, E, essential fatty acids and zinc.  It helps to soften wrinkles, scar tissue, and helps to regenerate the skin.  It is anti-inflammatory, anti-oxidant and smells  like macaroons.  

This Body oil is a blend of Italian Olive, Hawaiian Macadamia, Jojoba and Wheat germ oils infused with Calendula, Chamomile, Lavender, Elder Flower and Melissa.  Combined with Vanilla infused Coconut oil, Almond, Kukui and Pumpkin Seed oils. Then lightly scented with Essential Oils of Sandalwood, cedarwood and ylang ylang.

name: Cocoa Body Butter 1.7fl.oz.
description: Queen Bee's Cocoa Body Butter is extremely nourishing.  We include wildcrafted Maui Beeswax in our formulation, as well as Shea Butter, Mango Butter and Cocoa butter.  It is all infused with an organic vanilla bean.  Our skin soaks it right in and leaves minimal residue.  Queen Bee's Cocoa Body butter smells like chocolate cake.  Great for an eye moisturizer at night, a lip balm, or for dry skin after sun or snow.

name: 2 oz Facial CREMES
description:
CREME A LA ROSE: Our delightful rich, authentic Rose Creme for dry and dehydrated skin.  Contains Antioxidants of CoQ10, Coffee Berry Extract, OG Shea Butter, OG Cocoa Butter, Avocado oil, Carrot Oil, OG Rose Distillate, Rose Geranium and OG ROSE OTTO~ tinted pink with natural Alkanet root.  You'll wonder where the rose buds are!  
Bottled in a 2 oz frosted glass jar.

CREME DES FLEURS: Our light, milk cream for all skin types; Specific to combination skin.  Contains Vitamins A B C & E, Hyaluronic Acid, DMAE, MSM, Raw Maui Honey, Rooibos Extract, Coffee Berry Extract, Lavender Hydrosol & Essential oils of Lavender Bergamot & Blue Chamomile. Bottled in 2 oz frosted glass with a pump.

OUT OF STOCK/REFORMULATING
CREME ROYALE: Our creamy, caramel moisturizer good for all skin types. Contains Vitamins A B C & E, Hyaluronic Acid, DMAE, MSM, Raw Maui Honey, GINSENG Extract, Coffee Berry Extract, Lemon Balm Hydrosol, Essential oils of Sandalwood, Vanilla and Cedarwood. Bottled in 2 oz Amber Glass with a pump.

name: Herbal Healing Salves 1.7 oz
description:
Queen Bee Productions' Herbal Healing Salves are POTENT:

Maui Auwi Balm is a heal-all for external wounds and cuts. QB's Infused herbal salve blended with plantian, NONI, gotu kola and comfrey.  Set in Maui's own beeswax. It doesn't sting and is Essential for diaper bags, purses, sports, all activities.  Medicinal salve for all auwi's!!

Sprains & Strains Salve is for applying topically to sore muscles, bruises, arthritis, tennis elbow, sprained ankle, shin splints etc.  Blended with an herbal infusion of Arnica, Comfrey, NONI and Dragon's Blood (which is a resin).  Great for athletes, sports injuries, children's bruises or elderly joints. Sprains & Strains has Camphor & Peppermint for a heated chill in the tissues.

Ecz'orasis Balm is recommended topically to affected areas for the symptoms of Eczema & Psoriasis. Contains Vitamins A B1 B2 D & E, Essential Fatty Acids, heavily infused with Oregon Grape Root, Chickweed, Comfrey and Gotu Cola.  HIghly saturated with Avocado oil, which is specifically recommended for Eczema & Psoriasis. Spiced with Juniper Essential oil for irritation relief, antiseptic and purifying.

name: Queen Bee Travel Kit
description:
Choose: Rose, Lavender or Citrus

1oz Honey Cleanser
1oz Facial Toner
1oz Luxurious Body Oil
.85 Royal Exfoliant
.85 Cocoa Body Butter

A Little of each product for safe travels. CAN CARRY ON!! Comes in a plastic zipper pouch.  Please Reuse the packaging!

name: Queen Bee Logo Tote
description:
Queen Bee Logo Tote
FREE WITH $200+ PRODUCT ORDER Code: FREETOTE
Nice Quality, Heavy canvas bag.  Washable. 
Dry Flat, do not bleach.  

-Catch All 
-Beach Bag
-Boat Tote
-Grocery Bag
-Diaper Bag

Dont forget your favorite Queen Bee Product!
Support you local apiaries, spread honey awareness!

name: Epsom Bath Soaks
description:
Ever needed a boost for your bath?  

Just had a massage, want to rinse off the toxins? Had a long weekend, need to focus? Feeling crummy, like you're fighting a cold? 
YOU NEED THE 
PURIFYING SOAK:
Mixed with Ground Organic Lavender flowers & scented with Rosemary, Lavender, Bergamot and Tangerine Essential Oils.
*OR*
Long day in the office? Finally got a moment away from the kids? 
Just need to decompress?  
YOU NEED THE
CALMING SOAK: Mixed with Ground Organic Chamomile flowers and scented with Blue Chamomile, Frankincense, Blue Cypress & Vanilla Essential Oils.

Directions: Draw bath, pour salt mixture into bath, soak, enjoy.

name: Foaming Honey Body Cleanser 8oz.
description:
8 oz of Delicious and all natural Honey based body wash.  Made with Vegan, Sulfate Free, Organic Castile soap, Organic Aloe Vera Gel, Raw Maui Honey and Essential Oils:  

Olinda: Eucalyptus, Cedarwood & Lemon Essential Oils
Kula: Peppermint Essential Oil
Hana: Jasmine, Sweet Orange Essential Oils
Wailea: Lime, Grapefruit, Bergamot, Lemon Essential oils

Packaged in a BPA free Plastic foaming dispenser.

name: 12 oz. Sugar & Salt Scrubs
description:
Nearly Edible, delicious, body scrubs:  

~Pele's Delight COFFEE SALT Scrub: 
Hawaiian Rock Salt, *Ground Maui Coffee, Black Lava Salt (Activated Charcoal), Sunflower Oil, Vanilla Essential Oil

~Lokelani ROSE SUGAR Scrub:
Organic Raw Sugar, Sunflower Oil, Ground Rose petals, *Maui Rose Petals, Hibiscus Powder, Vitamin E, Essential Oils of: Rose Geranium, Ylang Ylang

~LEMON Meringue SUGAR Scrub:
Organic Raw Sugar, Sunflower Oil, Ground Lemon Peel, Vanilla Extract, Essential oils of: Vanilla & Lemon

*Maui Ingredients

Directions: Stir Well, apply to chosen areas, scrub, enjoy, rinse. Biodegradable, safe for the environment & All Natural.

name: Honey Cleanser 4oz.
description:
Queen Bee's Honey Cleansers are a daily foaming cleanser for face and body:

The Rose Cleanser is formulated with Organic Rose Hydrosol, Essential oils of Rose Geranium and Lemongrass, and Raw, Wildcrafted Maui Honey.  Rose has anti-inflammatory, cell regenerating, and toning properties. It is beneficial to all skin types, specific to dry and sensitive skin.

The Citrus Honey Cleanser is formulated with Organic Organic Aloe Vera Gel, Essential oils of Tangerine, Grapefruit and Lemongrass, as well as our Raw Maui Honey.  Another great cleanser for combination skin.  Citrus helps calm the nerves and breaks up oil buildup.

The Lavender Honey Cleanser is formulated with Lavender Essential oil, Organic Aloe Vera Gel, and of Course, Raw Maui Honey!  Great for combination skin and normal skin types as lavender has antibacterial properties.

Queens of ancient times used this sweet ambrosia to heal and preserve their complexions. Honey has natural antibiotic and humectant properties, so it heals and moisturizes the skin.  

*Seperation is NORMAL:this is an emulsion with no synthetic emulsifer, so shake lightly when seperation occurs(it does not mean the product is spoiled).  Best if kept out of direct sunlight and used in the first 6 months after opening.

name: Royal Exfoliant 1.7fl.oz.
description:
This is  our gentle facial exfoliant made with wildcrafted Raw Maui honey, organic local Green Papaya powder, apricot kernel meal, ground lavender and bentonite clay in aloe gel.  Also may be applied and left on as a mask.  Green Papaya contains papain which is an active enzyme that dissolves the dead skin cells.  For best results use 2-3 times per week.  Exfoliants are a great way to keep the complexion fresh, clear of blemishes and even skin tone.  It has an Almond fragrance with a hint of Lavender.
 1.70 fl. oz.

name: Rose, Citrus & Lavender Facial Toners 4 fl.oz.
description:
Rose Toner is a facial mister made with Organic Rose Hydrosol and Organic Rose Otto, the most luxurious essential oil. Best for dry, sensitive or easily reddened skin, but great for all skin types.  Rose has been utilized for centuries as an integral ingredient in skin care.  Roses are calming and uplifting to the senses and are calming for the skin.  Rose has anti-inflammatory properties and tones the capillaries, which makes it soothing for rosacea, sensitive skin and toning for broken couperose.

Our Honey Lavender Facial toner is great for all skin types. It is formulated with Organic Lavender Hydrosol, Lavender Essential oil, Organic Aloe Vera Gel and Raw Maui Honey.  Lavender has anti-bacterial properties and soothes the central nervous system.  It calms inflamed, irritated and acneic skin.  Lavender soothes burns, bug bites, insomniacs, headaches and menstrual cramps.  Our Lavender Facial Toner also contains Raw Maui Honey to help wounds heal, and to draw moisture to the skin.

Our Honey Citrus Toner is great for problematic skin.  Formulated to clear oil, bacteria, and tone the skin.  Includes Organic Lemon Verbena Hydrosol, Raw Maui Honey as a humectant to rebalance the skin's moisture, witch hazel to sanitize and refresh the capillaries, Citrus oils to cut through sebum and Frankincense & Moroccan Blue Chamomile Oil for inflammation.

name: Aztec Facial Masque 1.7 fl oz
description: Organic Chocolate, Honey, Aloe, Clay, Cinnamon, Paprika.... A stimulating and hydrating Masque for face and body.  Smells like a spiced mocha and feels like heaven.  Great for Combination skin types, or waking up dull or tired skin!

name: 2oz Moroccan Rose Masque
description: A Rich, Chocolate & Honey Masque infused with Roses.  Contains, Maui Raw Honey, Organic Cacao Powder, Moroccan Rhassoul Clay, Organic Rose Hydrosol and Coffee Berry Extract.  Very Hydrating and soothing for dry skin.  Healing and Antioxidant for all skin types!

name: 9 oz Ecz'orasis Balm or Strains & Sprains Salve
description:
A 9oz size of the Ecz'orasis Balm for those who would like a consistent supply.  Avocado and Coconut Oils Infused with Oregon Grape Root and spiced with Juniper Essential oil.

A 9oz tub of our Strains & Sprains Salve for inflammation of the muscles and tendons.  Includes Maui Noni and Beeswax.  Great for Massage therapists' private practice.  Makes a nice spot treatment for tight muscles.

name: 8oz Luxurious Body Oil
description: Our Luxurious Body Oil has a new size! The 8 oz plastic pump.  Same look as the 4 oz.  See description in 4oz.

name: 1oz. Honey Cleanser
description:
Queen Bee's Honey Cleansers are a daily foaming cleanser for face and body:

The Rose Cleanser is formulated with Organic Rose Hydrosol, Essential oils of Rose Geranium and Lemongrass, and Raw, Wildcrafted Maui Honey.  Rose has anti-inflammatory, cell regenerating, and toning properties. It is beneficial to all skin types, specific to dry and sensitive skin.

name: 1oz. Honey Facial Toners
description:
Queen Bee's Rose Facial Toner is formulated with Organic Rose Hydrosol and Organic Rose Otto, one of the most luxurious oils.  It takes 40,000 rose buds to yield a single drop of essential oil.  Mist face and leave on for the skin to absorb.  Rose has anti inflammatory and toning properties.  Good for skin that is reddened easily, Rosacea, sensitive types and couperose or broken capillaries.   Also great for the heart, physically and metaphorically. 

Our Lavender Facial Toner is great for all skin types. It is formulated with Organic Lavender Hydrosol, Lavender Essential oil, Organic Aloe Vera Gel and Raw Maui Honey.  Lavender has anti-bacterial properties and soothes the central nervous system.  It calms inflamed, irritated and acneic skin.  Lavender soothes burns, bug bites, insomniacs, headaches and menstrual cramps.  Our Lavender Facial Toner also contains Raw Maui Honey to help wounds heal, and to draw moisture to the skin.

The Citrus Facial Toner is great for problematic skin.  Formulated to clear oil, bacteria, and tone the skin.  Includes Organic Lemon Verbena Hydrosol, Raw Maui Honey as a humectant to rebalance the skin's moisture, witch hazel to sanitize and refresh the capillaries, Citrus oils to cut through sebum and Frankincense & Moroccan Blue Chamomile Oil for inflammation.

name: Noni & Arnica Massage Oil 8 oz.
description:
8 oz Plastic Pump (Sprains & Strains herbal infused formula)

Olive & Sunflower oils infused in Arnica, Lavender, Comfrey, Calendula & St. Johns Wort. 

Noni oil Concentrate and Dragon's Blood resin added for extra potency. 

Great for deep tissue health.  

Spiced with Comfrey & Peppermint Essential Oil for maximum penetration.
